00025 template<typename WrapType, Info_VarType VAR_TYPE>
00026 struct InfoRefType

00034   { return data.isBound();}

00046   {

00049     VAR_INFO_PRINT_0("Assigned", assign);
00050     return assign;
00051   }

00065     VAR_INFO_PRINT_1("is assigned ", i, isAssignValue);
00066     return isAssignValue;
00067   }
